paper.title: Estimation of value-at-risk using single index quantile regression
paper.abstract: Value-at-Risk (VaR) is one of the best known and most heavily used measures of financial risk. In this paper, we introduce a non-iterative semiparametric model for VaR estimation called the single index quantile regression time series (SIQRTS) model. To test its performance, we give an application to four major US market indices: the S&P 500 Index, the Russell 2000 Index, the Dow Jones Industrial Average, and the NASDAQ Composite Index. Our results suggest that this method has a good finite sample performance and often outperforms a number of commonly used methods.

domain_result.justification: The paper focuses on the estimation of Value-at-Risk (VaR), which is a key measure in financial risk management. The proposed SIQRTS model is specifically designed for VaR estimation, and the application to major US market indices further confirms its relevance to risk management.
